name: Home-icide
description:
This was made for Global Game Jam 2019!

CONTROLS
Left arrow, Right arrow: Move left and right
Up arrow: Jump
Space: Shoot
Z: Flamethrower
X: Shoot Car

Credits: 

Noelle Johnston - Music, Sound Effects

Utkarsh Rao Viswavasu - Engineering, Design

Nate Shirey - Art, Animation

Dhaman Mehta - Production, Art

Joeseph Moyle - Engineering

Jackson Chambers -  Art

Jesse Batton - Art

Andrew Taylor Johnson - Visual Effects
